3D Visualisation Video

For the person that just wants life simple. Your solutions are laid out in front of your prospect and are clear to see and appreciate, emphasising the ease and value of your software implementation.

  • Custom video from a script (max 150 words) which has been written by us and approved by you
  • 3D models and assets selected from our library based on script
  • Pre-visualised sketch to time video with accompanying Word document showing sketches and accompanying text. One set of revisions
  • Professional voice over from our current voice over artists library
  • Royalty free music from our stock library selection
  • Video edited / produced to professional standard and submitted for 1 final set of client revisions
  • Web quality video provided. Uploaded to your website integrated with player
  • Up to one minute long

To find out more about our video services please call us on 01536 771440 or complete the form on our GET IN TOUCH page.
